## CSST 
[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/csst/badge/?version=latest)](https://csst.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)
  

CSST pipeline.


## install
```
pip install -U git+git://github.com/csster/csst
```
